reg_info.act_under: Ontario College of Trades and Apprenticeship Act, 2009

content.section: Person authorized to act as executive director
content.content: 1. (1) The Minister may authorize a person to exercise the powers and duties of Executive Director, Corporate Services for the College. O. Reg. 384/11, s. 1 (1). (2) The Minister may authorize a person to exercise the powers and duties of Executive Director, Corporate Services under subsection (1) from time to time until the earlier of the day the Board appoints an Executive Director, Corporate Services and the day this Regulation is revoked. O. Reg. 384/11, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Minister may authorize a person to exercise the powers and duties of Executive Director, Corporate Services for the College. O. Reg. 384/11, s. 1 (1).

(2) The Minister may authorize a person to exercise the powers and duties of Executive Director, Corporate Services under subsection (1) from time to time until the earlier of the day the Board appoints an Executive Director, Corporate Services and the day this Regulation is revoked. O. Reg. 384/11, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. The person who is authorized to exercise the powers and duties of the Executive Director, Corporate Services may do so until the earlier of the following: 1. The day the Board appoints an Executive Director, Corporate Services. 2. The day this Regulation is revoked. O. Reg. 384/11, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. The person who is authorized to exercise the powers and duties of the Executive Director, Corporate Services may do so until the earlier of the following:

1. The day the Board appoints an Executive Director, Corporate Services.

2. The day this Regulation is revoked. O. Reg. 384/11, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 384/11, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 384/11, s. 3.

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 384/11, s. 4. Français
content.raw_html:
4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 384/11, s. 4.
